name: X-BOT-MD
description: X-BOT-MD â€“ A Simple and Powerful WhatsApp Bot

SESSION_ID.description: Paste your WhatsApp Session ID here (Required).

HANDLERS.description: Set a prefix for commands (Example: ., !, #). Default is '.'

SUDO.description: Enter owner numbers with country code (without +), separated by commas for multiple owners. Example: 919876543210,917012345678

HEROKU_APP_NAME.description: Enter the exact name of your Heroku app (must match the app name you created).

HEROKU_API_KEY.description: Paste your Heroku API Key (Get it from https://dashboard.heroku.com/account).

STICKER_DATA.description: Set the Sticker Pack name and Author name (Format: PackName;AuthorName).

ALWAYS_ONLINE.description: Set to 'true' to keep bot always online, or 'false' to stay offline until a message is received.

WORK_TYPE.description: Set bot mode: 'public' to allow everyone to use, 'private' to allow only owner/sudo users.

AUTO_STATUS_VIEW.description: Set to 'true' to auto-view WhatsApp statuses, or 'false' to disable.
